onboardingDescription1: Enjoy thousands of selected manga that you can read anytime and anywhere, all in one app.
onboardingDescription2: Explore a curated selection of the latest and greatest manga. From action-packed epics to heartwarming tales, there's something for everyone.
onboardingDescription3: Never miss out on the latest chapters and new releases. With Comino, you will always be up-to-date with the freshest manga content. Get notifications for your favorite series and be the first to read the newest additions!
termsAndConditions: I agree to the Terms and Conditions
forgotPasswordText: Forgot your password? Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link.
